channel.title: How Do I Know If People Can Connect To My Server?
channel.description:
So I Have Used 2 Guides To Set Up My Server. 1.How To Start A Server By Soul 2.How To Portforward Easy By Lewk
So I Have Followed The Instructions and I Have Used A Source, but How do I make it that my IP Can Be Used To Get Onto My Server? Because all i Do is Run The Source Login and BAM im In... But How Will Other People Connect To Me When I Dont Even Know If The IP Is Connected To My Server? :confused:
Thanks Glad If You Can Help :D

item.title: How Do I Know If People Can Connect To My Server?
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

[quote=“Respected Cheerio, post:10, topic:292492”][quote author=demonnd link=topic=386429.msg2896359#msg2896359 date=1249243364]
your disobaying rule 1

1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related question will be locked. Requesting a hoster, coder, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related.

[/quote]

Your another Moparscape noob that is trying to make a rule up. LOL.[/quote] He’s not making up a rule, just trying to say that this is part of that rule which it isn’t

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Know If People Can Connect To My Server?

item.title: How Do I Know If People Can Connect To My Server?
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Go to ipchicken to find out your ip and type that into client if you can connect other should be able to.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Know If People Can Connect To My Server?
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

.[quote=“Respected Cheerio, post:2, topic:292492”]Type your server ip as 0.0.0.0 and if you can connect to that other people can connect to your ip.[/quote]

lol, that’s not right, type in you actual ip of the server then you know, 0.0.0.0 just connects to your computer without need of internet.

Read full topic

Type your server ip as 0.0.0.0 and if you can connect to that other people can connect to your ip.
